name: Green Deck
effect: At end of each round: +$1 per remaining hand, +$1 per remaining discard, no interest earned

name: Black Deck
unlock: Discover at least 100 items from your collection

name: Magic Deck
effect: Start run with 2 Crystal Ball voucher and 2 copies of The Fool
unlock: Win a run with any deck on Blue Stake or higher

name: Nebula Deck
unlock: Win a run with any deck on Blue Stake or higher

name: Ghost Deck
effect: Spectral cards may appear in the shop, start with a Hex card
unlock: Win a run with any deck on Blue Stake or higher

name: Abandoned Deck
effect: Start run with no Face Cards in your deck
unlock: Win a run with any deck on Blue Stake or higher

name: Checkered Deck
effect: Start run with 26 Spades and 26 Clubs
unlock: Win a run with any deck on Blue Stake or higher

name: Zodiac Deck
effect: Start run with 3 Planet cards, 2 Tarot cards, and 1 Planet Merchant voucher
unlock: Win a run with any deck on the Green difficulty or harder

name: Painted Deck
unlock: Win a run with any deck on the Green difficulty or harder

name: Anaglyph Deck
effect: After defeating each Boss Blind, gain a Double Tag
unlock: Win a run with any deck on the Green difficulty or harder

name: Plasma Deck
effect: Balance Chips and Mult when calculating score for played hand
unlock: Win a run with any deck on the Green difficulty or harder

name: Erratic Deck
effect: All ranks and suits in deck are randomized
unlock: Win a run with any deck on the Green difficulty or harder
